General.Name: Nano One Materials Corp.
General.Description: Nano One Materials Corp. produces cathode active materials for lithium-ion battery applications in electric vehicles, energy storage systems, and consumer electronics applications. It also offers lithium iron phosphate cathode materials for automotive and non-automotive applications. The company is headquartered in Burnaby, Canada.
General.Address: 8575 Government Street, Burnaby, BC, Canada, V3N 4V1
